metadata.title: CVE-2023-1071 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions from 15.5before 15.8.5, all versions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.4, all versionsstarting from 15.10 before 15.10.1. Due to improper permissions checks itwas possible for an unauthorised user to remove an issue from an epic.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
